structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.text:
The commission may:
Establish bylaws, rules and regulations for its own government;
Make and enter into all contracts or agreements necessary or incidental to the performance of its duties and the execution of its powers; and
Employ engineers, attorneys, and other necessary employees, and fix their compensation.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235g-10.
